name: The Flame Of Love
description:
In the Flame of Love is a game developed for Youtuber Brackey's Game Jam. You play as two young newlywed hearts who take a honeymoon in volcano. In this survival game, you will have to fend off of zombies, missiles, meteors, and a demon as a final boss. 

Controls:

  • wasd, arrow keys, or a joystick to move characters around
  • Mouse to select Start and Retry button
  • blind character will not stop moving in a direction and is twice as slow as other character
  • single player only

Bug Fixes:

  • character movement immediately stops after key release
  • Spikes during boss fight despawn instead of falling endlessly

Credits:

  • Unity used as game engine
  • beep box used as music creator
  • Photoshop used as artwork creator
  • all artwork, scripts, and music created by Zachary Shah
